mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_QNA(QNA_QUESTION, QNA_ANSWER, QNA_WRITER, QNA_TITLE) VALUES (#{qnaQuestion}, #{qnaAnswer}, #{qnaWriter}, #{qnaTitle})
mapper.select: SELECT QNA_NO, QNA_TITLE, QNA_WRITER, REG_DATE, QNA_ANSWER, QNA_QUESTION FROM TB_QNA where qna_no = #{no}
SELECT QNA_NO, QNA_TITLE, QNA_WRITER, REG_DATE FROM TB_QNA ORDER BY REG_DATE DESC
